search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Updown.io (updownio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://updown.io/assets/background-e619687a9106f44e8ec2a75f28713428bc41a241815a94b32d67a68ce9b15a16.jpg)

70053918191

  
requests performed

*   ### HTTP(S), TCP(S), ICMP
    
    Five check types to cover most of your online services (not just web).
    
*   ### Pulse/cron Monitoring
    
    Keep an eye on your periodic tasks and cron jobs. [How?](https://updown.io/doc/how-pulse-cron-monitoring-works)
    
*   ### Dual-Stack
    
    Zero configuration dual-stack monitoring (IPv4/v6), same price.
    
*   ### Fast checks, fair price
    
    Set the check frequency between 15s and 1h. The [pricing](https://updown.io/#pricing) scales linearly.
    
*   ### TLS/SSL testing
    
    Receive alerts in case of invalid or expiring soon certificate.
    
*   ### Domain expiration alerts
    
    Receive alerts when your domains are about to expire (RDAP/WHOIS).
    
*   ### Double-check
    
    Downtimes are confirmed from at least two different [locations.](https://updown.io/about)
    
*   ### Text search
    
    Match the presence of a string instead of the regular HTTP status.
    
*   ### Various notification channels
    
    Email, Webhook, Slack, Teams, Telegram, SMS, Statuspage, Zapier.
    
*   ### Hosted status pages
    
    Provides [single-site](https://meta.updown.io/) and [multi-site](https://demo.updown.io/) availability & performance reports.
    
*   ### Crypto, Paypal, Cards, SEPA
    
    We accept credit cards, Paypal, SEPA transfers, and many cryptocurrencies.
    
*   ### REST API & WebHooks
    
    Hack and integrate updown.io with the [REST & WebHook APIs.](https://updown.io/api)

Pricing
-------

You only pay for what you use, check by check. 1 credit \= 1 check.

For example, check10 websitesevery2 minutesfrom 

1.83

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) PERFECT, you guys rock. this tool has been so helpful to us this past month with some DDoS issues on Linode.
>

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) Perfect alternative to pingdom. You will have 2 paying customers soon plus more. Beautiful job!
>

> 
> — Loïc Mathaud (@loicmathaud) [March 1, 2016](https://twitter.com/loicmathaud/status/704677528603123713?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Really digging the [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) uptime monitoring. Simple, elegant, great price and super quick to setup. Highly recommended!
> 
> — Greg Ratner (@GregRatner) [May 9, 2016](https://twitter.com/GregRatner/status/729799544293199873?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Couldn't recommend [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) any more. I love that they do a single thing, really well. I don't always want something as complex as others.
> 
> — Pete Heslop (@Pwheslop) [June 23, 2016](https://twitter.com/Pwheslop/status/745911645046718464?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) SSL expiration warnings emails are a nice touch. Great to find out we get more than we paid for!
> 
> — Jean-Michel Lacroix (@jmlacroix) [May 11, 2017](https://twitter.com/jmlacroix/status/862655210308734977?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) has now replaced pingdom as my monitoring tool of choice. Simple, clean. Straightforward billing terms and they accept BITCOIN!
> 
> — pinacodelada (@pinacodelada) [January 17, 2015](https://twitter.com/pinacodelada/status/556538047677075457?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Oooooooh per site webhooks! Neat! :D
> 
> — Matt Cavanagh (@Maelstromeous) [August 16, 2017](https://twitter.com/Maelstromeous/status/897847485250535425?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) Really loving your monitoring service! The status pages are very, very sweet as well! Miles better and cleaner than Pingdom.
> 
> — Matt Cavanagh (@Maelstromeous) [January 3, 2016](https://twitter.com/Maelstromeous/status/683453586517409793?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Good job to you! Updown.io is simply the nicest looking uptime checker on earth 💅🏼 🚀🚀 And pricing is really good :)
> 
> — Gladys Project (@gladysproject) [July 30, 2017](https://twitter.com/gladysproject/status/891751914664337408?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Love using [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) as one of our server monitoring providers, easily the best interface in the business and always had top notch support the rare time I have needed it.
> 
> — Ollie Castle (@olliecastle) [November 30, 2017](https://twitter.com/olliecastle/status/936323876841246720?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) Just started using you. Love the service - super slick, friendly, and well executed! Thank you :)
> 
> — ErgoDox EZ (@ErgoDoxEZ) [September 16, 2016](https://twitter.com/ErgoDoxEZ/status/776762908084764672?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> Wow!! [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) you are truly awesome.. I got exactly what I needed.
> 
> — Aditya Patadia (@adityapatadia) [March 10, 2017](https://twitter.com/adityapatadia/status/840070252763332612?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> This simple yet powerful and very good uptime monitoring service updown.io just added a new feature. Recommended! [https://t.co/vg8DUILsOb](https://t.co/vg8DUILsOb)

> If you are looking around for a web monitoring tool, check [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw). Great service with plenty of free credit to try it out!
> 
> — Thanasis Delenikas (@TDelenikas) [May 14, 2017](https://twitter.com/TDelenikas/status/863698574886023168?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> If you need a simple, cost effective Website Uptime and speed monitor, try [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
> 
> Great service. Simple to setup. Nice GUI for status.
>

> And damned awesome, switched from Pingdom a few years ago and have never looked back. ❤️❤️❤️

> — Ben Everard (@\_beneverard) [August 15, 2017](https://twitter.com/_beneverard/status/897477588318388224?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> I was looking for a [@goserverless](https://twitter.com/goserverless?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) alternative to [@updownio](https://twitter.com/updownio?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) so I can check many different websites for few $ a month but it was just before checking the pricing page.  
> Signup.  
> It's really an "inexpensive website monitoring" 👌
> 
> — Jérémy (@j0k) [January 1, 2018](https://twitter.com/j0k/status/947885948347518980?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

> There are few tools I aspire to when building my own - this is one of them!
> 
> — Pete Heslop (@Pwheslop) [August 3, 2016](https://twitter.com/Pwheslop/status/760780752036499456?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

ϟ Website monitoring — beautiful, simple and inexpensive.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on credits, with 1 credit equaling 1 check. Users can purchase credits in packs, and the cost per check decreases with larger packs.
